Desc.entry: Passport photobooths are located at the following sites: Arundel Gate Travel Information Centre, Arundel Gate, S1 2PN, Tel 0114 221 1526; The Archway Centre, Sheffield Interchange, Pond Street, S1 2BG, Tel 0114 221 1521; Boots The Chemist, 4-6 High Street, Sheffield, S1 2GE, Tel 0114 276 8333; Sheffield Railway Station, Sheaf Street, Sheffield, S1 2BP; Sheffield Hallam University, Level 2, City Campus, Howard Street, Sheffield, S1 1WB, Tel 0114 225 5555; Wilkinsons, 34 Haymarket, Sheffield, S1 2AX, Tel 0114 272 5185; WHSmith, 38-40 Fargate, S2 2HE, Tel 0114 273 1176.
